segments.text: I glance at the kitchen and spot the woman at the sink, totally engrossed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the faucet is still running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's overflowing, creating this unexpected waterfall effect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it without a clue—how did she miss that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy's climbing the stool toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whoa, that stool is tilting back dangerously—didn't see that coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in hand, sharing with the girl who's reaching up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window reveals a serene garden, which surprises me amid the indoor frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled aside let in the light, highlighting every detail.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plate she's drying looks pristine, contrasting the wet chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how they're all so unaware of each other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's widening fast; this could get out of hand quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such sneaky fun from the kids in a simple kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
